content:
Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 22}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 14, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft a warped_sign, I need to place 6 warped planks and a stick in the crafting grid. There are 6 warped planks in slot 22, so I will start by moving one of them into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 14}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 22}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 14, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I need to move another warped plank to the crafting grid, but I must make sure to put it adjacent to the previous plank. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, so I will move the plank there.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 8 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 14}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 14, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I can craft the warped_signs by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 3
